original: Berner, Josef Mauritz Leonard, komminister, Ringamåla, f, 27/8/06 i Ivetofta, Krist. 1., av Per B. o. Ida Magnusson. G. 36 m. Gunborg Elisabet Linde. Barn: Bengt f. 37, Håkan 45. — Stud:ex. i Kristianst. 25, teol. fil. ex. i Lund 26, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Lunds stift 34. Tj:gjort s. v. pastor i Bac-karyd, Kverrestad, Uppåkra, Andra-rum, Ivetofta o. Näsum, s. v. kom-min. i Landskr., s. pred. v. S :t Lars •sjukh. i Lund, kommin:adj. o. v. korn-min. i Ringamåla 36, kommin. där sed. 42. Kyrkokassör sed. 37, ordf. i kyr-koistämma sed. 37, i fam :bidT :’nd sed. 39, i skolstyr., v. ordf. i barnavrnd sed. 37, led. av tax:nd sed. 40.
translated: Berner, Josef Mauritz Leonard, minister, Ringamåla, born August 27, 1906 in Ivetofta, Kristianstad county, son of Per B. and Ida Magnusson. Married in 1936 to Gunborg Elisabet Linde. Children: Bengt (born 1937) and Håkan (born 1945). Completed high school in Kristianstad in 1925, received a degree in theology from Lund University in 1926, passed practical theology exams and was ordained for the Lund diocese in 1934. Served as a pastor in Backaryd, Kverrestad, Uppåkra, Andrarum, Ivetofta and Näsum, as well as chaplain at S:t Lars hospital in Lund. Became assistant minister and vicar in Ringamåla in 1936, and minister there in 1942. Treasurer of the church since 1937, chairman of the church meeting since 1937, in the family welfare committee since 1939, in the school board and vice chairman of the child protection committee since 1937, and a member of the tax assessment committee since 1940.
